subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: With Derrick Rose still out of the lineup, Joakim Noah took over the duties of superstar in the Bulls’ Game 2 victory, in honor of both Rose and a childhood hero.
snippet: With Derrick Rose still out of the lineup, Joakim Noah took over the duties of superstar in the Bulls’ Game 2 victory, in honor of both Rose and a childhood hero.
